data.text:
It's the day of the Selection Race, where the trainers scout out 
the abilities of the horsegirls and form partnerships. 
I had just arrived at the grounds and as I looked around—
data.processed:
<story>It's the day of the Selection Race, where the trainers scout out 
<story>the abilities of the horsegirls and form partnerships. 
<story>I had just arrived at the grounds and as I looked around—

data.text:
Hey, hey, hey! You're the trainer from the other day!! 
I'm so glad you're here!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Hey, hey, hey! You're the trainer from the other day!! 
<story>I'm so glad you're here!!

data.text:
It's been nothing but great! Always ready, always prepared! 
That's what makes a class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>It's been nothing but great! Always ready, always prepared! 
<story>That's what makes a class president!

data.text:
Now, I'll be in the next race!! 
Please observe my excellence! ……Don't expect anything less!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Now, I'll be in the next race!! 
<story>Please observe my excellence! ……Don't expect anything less!!

data.text: Now excuse me! Bakushin bakushiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Now excuse me! Bakushin bakushiiin!!

data.text:
Huh? Sakura Bakushin O is running next? 
I thought short distances were her forte…
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Huh? Sakura Bakushin O is running next? 
<story>I thought short distances were her forte…

data.text:
She's registered to run in the long distance. 
Does she have something up her sleeve…?
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>She's registered to run in the long distance. 
<story>Does she have something up her sleeve…?

data.text: That was how the race started. Sakura Bakushin O was…
data.processed: <story>That was how the race started. Sakura Bakushin O was…

data.text: Here I go!! Bakushin bakushin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Here I go!! Bakushin bakushin!!

data.text:
Sakura Bakushin O makes a quick start!! 
She's pulling away from the rest of the field!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Sakura Bakushin O makes a quick start!! 
<story>She's pulling away from the rest of the field!!

data.text:
I'm not done yet! 
Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I'm not done yet! 
<story>Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiiin!!!!

data.text:
Bakushin O leads! Bakushin O leads!! 
What fearsome acceleration! She's got lightning in her legs!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Bakushin O leads! Bakushin O leads!! 
<story>What fearsome acceleration! She's got lightning in her legs!

data.text: (Woooooaaaaaaah!!)
data.processed: <story>(Woooooaaaaaaah!!)

data.text:
The race had barely started, and the audience already erupted. 
But her performance was so amazing that my mind had already just 
accepted this bizarre scene.
data.processed:
<story>The race had barely started, and the audience already erupted. 
<story>But her performance was so amazing that my mind had already just 
<story>accepted this bizarre scene.

data.text:
Hey, isn't she going too early!? 
If she goes that hard from the start of… no, but…!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Hey, isn't she going too early!? 
<story>If she goes that hard from the start of… no, but…!

data.text:
What amazing speed…! 
I've never seen such a fast start before…!!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>What amazing speed…! 
<story>I've never seen such a fast start before…!!

data.text: If she keeps going like this, maybe…!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed: <story>If she keeps going like this, maybe…!

data.text: …It wasn't long before excited voices surrounded me.
data.processed: <story>…It wasn't long before excited voices surrounded me.

data.text:
They've reached the fourth corner! 
Each horsegirl is waiting for the right moment to strike—
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They've reached the fourth corner! 
<story>Each horsegirl is waiting for the right moment to strike—

data.text: Bakushin… Bakushiiiin…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Bakushin… Bakushiiiin…

data.text:
S-Sakura Bakushin O is dropping back!? 
Where has her momentum gone!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>S-Sakura Bakushin O is dropping back!? 
<story>Where has her momentum gone!?

data.text: I'm out… of… energy…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I'm out… of… energy…

data.text: Ahhh…
data.name: Trainers
data.processed: <story>Ahhh…

data.text:
Soon, Sakura Bakushin O slipped down the rankings and 
eventually finished in 12th place…
data.processed:
<story>Soon, Sakura Bakushin O slipped down the rankings and 
<story>eventually finished in 12th place…

data.text:
Gahh, 12th place…! 
The disappointment…!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Your start was great, too bad.
You started great, it's a shame.

data.processed:
<story>Gahh, 12th place…! 
<story>The disappointment…!

data.text: No… everyone was fast this time!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>No… everyone was fast this time!

data.text:
Honestly acknowledging competitors is 
what makes a class president!! 
Wah, so noble, I could be a princess!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Honestly acknowledging competitors is 
<story>what makes a class president!! 
<story>Wah, so noble, I could be a princess!!

data.text:
Oh, there you are. Hey, Sakura Bakushin O! 
Can I talk to you for a moment?
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Oh, there you are. Hey, Sakura Bakushin O! 
<story>Can I talk to you for a moment?

data.text:
By talk you must mean scout, right? 
Of course, of course, I've been waiting!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>By talk you must mean scout, right? 
<story>Of course, of course, I've been waiting!

data.text:
Oh, I… see. Thank you for agreeing. 
Shame about the result, but your pace was amazing! 
I'd love to recruit you.
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Oh, I… see. Thank you for agreeing. 
<story>Shame about the result, but your pace was amazing! 
<story>I'd love to recruit you.

data.text:
I will make you a top sprinter!! 
You can be world class in short distance!!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>I will make you a top sprinter!! 
<story>You can be world class in short distance!!

data.text:
Indeed! Yessir! 
Let's take on the sprinter's—
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Indeed! Yessir! 
<story>Let's take on the sprinter's—

data.text: Hmm? Sprinter?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Sprinter?

data.text:
Yeah… did I say something funny? Based on the race you just ran, 
you have a clear aptitude for short distances, right?
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… did I say something funny? Based on the race you just ran, 
<story>you have a clear aptitude for short distances, right?

data.text: I see, I see. So that's what you were thinking.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I see, I see. So that's what you were thinking.

data.text:
Then I'll have to decline! 
Thank you for reaching out to me! The way back's over there!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Then I'll have to decline! 
<story>Thank you for reaching out to me! The way back's over there!

data.text: Wha!? Ah, hey…!!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed: <story>Wha!? Ah, hey…!!

data.text:
Looking quite confused, the trainer who had reached out to her 
wandered away, swept up in Sakura Bakushin O's momentum.
data.processed:
<story>Looking quite confused, the trainer who had reached out to her 
<story>wandered away, swept up in Sakura Bakushin O's momentum.

data.text:
Phew, what a shame!! 
But with every farewell comes a new encounter!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Phew, what a shame!! 
<story>But with every farewell comes a new encounter!

data.text:
Speaking of — you've been standing there watching me 
for a while now! Don't you have something to say to me!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Speaking of — you've been standing there watching me 
<story>for a while now! Don't you have something to say to me!?

data.text: Or… were you planning to recruit me as a "sprinter" too?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Or… were you planning to recruit me as a "sprinter" too?

data.text:
If you can't resolutely give me a "NO", then — as much as it 
pains me — I must decline!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>If you can't resolutely give me a "NO", then — as much as it 
<story>pains me — I must decline!

data.text:
I'm sorry! I juuuust can't seem to 
limit myself to short distances!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Why are you so particular about that?
Why are you so particular about this?

data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry! I juuuust can't seem to 
<story>limit myself to short distances!

data.text: That's because I am the class president!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>That's because I am the class president!!!!

data.text:
Here's a question for you! Name a G1 race 
that is not a sprint race. Go on!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Japan Derby, Tenno Sho, Arima Kinen…

data.processed:
<story>Here's a question for you! Name a G1 race 
<story>that is not a sprint race. Go on!

data.text: Yes, exactly! …You understand, don't you?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Yes, exactly! …You understand, don't you?

data.text:
There are soooo many! 
So many more than just short distance races I need to win!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>There are soooo many! 
<story>So many more than just short distance races I need to win!!

data.text:
Didn't I tell you the other day? 
I am the class president, and the class president is me!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Didn't I tell you the other day? 
<story>I am the class president, and the class president is me!

data.text: I'm going to be everyone's role model!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I'm going to be everyone's role model!

data.text:
What do you think of when you hear the 
phrase "exemplary horsegirl"?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>What do you think of when you hear the 
<story>phrase "exemplary horsegirl"?

data.text:
Sprinters? Milers? Stayers? 
—No, exemplary is being all of these!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Sprinters? Milers? Stayers? 
<story>—No, exemplary is being all of these!

data.text: And that's why! I'm a class president!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>And that's why! I'm a class president!!

data.text:
So, my apologies. I'll leave you to it!! 
Bakushin bakushiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>So, my apologies. I'll leave you to it!! 
<story>Bakushin bakushiiin!!

data.text: I was rejected before even opening my mouth…
data.processed: <story>I was rejected before even opening my mouth…
